duties_responsibilities.duty: Support rendering features for the Unreal Engine rendering team, contributing innovative and original ideas towards all aspects of graphics development.
Enhance and maintain the graphics of Unreal Engine while creating new features.
Implement and improve Unreal Engine graphics pipelines.
Optimize performance of features on multiple platforms.
Manage and enhance tools that go along with features; ensuring they are usable and appropriate for artists, games, and the engine.

education_certification.credential: Advanced Degree in CS, Game Development, or related field with focus on rendering or image synthesis
